lead_paragraph: VICHY, Nov. 22 (AP) -- Authorized sources acknowledged today that Chief of State Marshal Petain was going to meet "a high German personage" in occupied France, amid indications of imminent developments in the Mediterranean area involving not only Germany, Italy and France but Spain as well.
abstract: Berne sources see France giving in to Nazis on questions of North African bases, Mediterranean Fleet use and Dakar defense; Vichy sources see Mediterranean developments involving Spain

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
